name: Mr. Sweet
description: Mr. Sweet - this is the crazy adventure of the most unusual runner in the universe! Help him and his friends to become the best of the best and beat all known and unknown records! Check your agility on the most complicated tracks in different parts of the universe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX 11 compatible card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
